code: const deepMap=(obj,fn)=>{const deepMapper=val=>isObject(val)?deepMap(val,fn):fn(val);if(Array.isArray(obj)){return obj.map(deepMapper);}if(isObject(obj)){return mapObject(obj,deepMapper);}return obj;};const mapObject=(obj,fn)=>Object.keys(obj).reduce((res,key)=>{res[key]=fn(obj[key]);return res;},{});const isObject=myVar=>myVar&&typeof myVar==='object';export default deepMap;
